pages.title: Enchanted Plants
pages.text: Mystical flora obtained via $(l:hexalia:core_mechanics/natures_ritual)Nature’s Ritual$(/l). Unlike ordinary plants, these can be activated to create powerful area effects.

pages.title: Morphora
pages.text: Mutates nearby blocks using $(l:hexalia:core_mechanics/mutation)Mutation$(/l).$(br)$(bold)Activate$(): right-click with $(l:hexalia:core_mechanics/mutation#mutavis)Mutavis$(/l).

pages.title: Grimshade
pages.text: $(bold)Activate$(): right-click with a $(l:hexalia:content/tools#hex_focus)Hex Focus$(/l).$(br)$(li)On activation: Skeletons → Wither Skeletons; up to 3 nearby skulls (incl. Candle/Wall) → Wither variants.$(br)$(li)Aura: Wither + Weakness to non-player mobs within ~8 blocks for ~120s (2400t).$(br)Re-activatable; disabled on Peaceful.

pages.title: Nautilite
pages.text: $(bold)Activate$(): $(l:hexalia:content/tools#hex_focus)Hex Focus$(/l).$(br)$(li)Conduit Power to players in ~16 blocks for ~2 min.$(br)$(li)Damages Guardians/Drowned.$(br)$(li)Removes Mining Fatigue.

pages.title: Windsong
pages.text: $(bold)Activate$(): $(l:hexalia:content/tools#hex_focus)Hex Focus$(/l).$(br)Creates a 5×5 wind barrier that nullifies incoming projectiles.

pages.title: Astrylis
pages.text: $(bold)Activate$(): right-click with a $(thing)Celestial Crystal$().$(br)Periodically applies bonemeal to nearby crops and saplings for ~2 minutes.

pages.title: Notes
pages.text: $(li)Most plants require a $(l:hexalia:content/tools#hex_focus)Hex Focus$(/l) to activate.$(br)$(li)Effects are temporary—plan placement for best coverage.$(br)$(li)Plants are intended for direct use rather than crafting.
